howTo.title: How It Works
howTo.description: Convert your images in just four simple steps. Our streamlined process makes image conversion fast and effortless.
howTo.step1Description: Start by selecting your image file. You can either drag and drop your image directly into the upload area or click the "Choose File" button to browse your computer. We support all major image formats including PNG, JPG, JPEG, WebP, GIF, BMP, and TIFF. The file will be automatically detected and ready for conversion.
howTo.step2Description: Select your desired output format from the dropdown menu. Our converter supports conversion between all popular image formats. Choose PNG for transparency, JPG for smaller file sizes, WebP for modern web optimization, or any other format that suits your needs. The input format will be automatically detected from your uploaded file.
howTo.step3Description: Once you've selected your input file and output format, simply click the "Convert Image" button. Our advanced processing engine will instantly convert your image while maintaining the highest quality possible. The conversion happens directly in your browser, ensuring your files remain private and secure.
howTo.step4Description: Your converted image is now ready! You can download the file directly to your device or copy a shareable link. The converted image will maintain its quality while being optimized for your chosen format. You'll also see detailed conversion information including file size reduction and processing time.
howTo.readyToStartDescription: Follow these simple steps and convert your images in seconds.

features.title: Why Choose Our Image Converter?
features.description: Built with modern web technologies to provide the fastest, most secure, and user-friendly image conversion experience.
features.lightningFastDesc: Convert images in seconds with our optimized processing engine. No waiting, just instant results.
features.completelySecureDesc: All conversions happen in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
features.multipleFormatsDesc: Support for PNG, JPG, WebP, GIF and more. Convert between any formats with maintained quality.
features.freeDesc: No subscriptions, no hidden fees, no limits. Use our image converter as much as you need, completely free.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions about our image converter? Find answers to the most common questions below.
faq.question1: What image formats do you support?
faq.answer1: We support all major image formats including PNG, JPG, JPEG, WebP, GIF, BMP, and TIFF. You can convert between any of these formats with maintained quality and optimal file sizes.
faq.question2: Is my data secure and private?
faq.answer2: Absolutely! All image conversions happen directly in your browser using client-side processing. Your images never leave your device or get uploaded to our servers, ensuring complete privacy and security.
faq.question3: Are there any file size limits?
faq.answer3: Our tool can handle images up to 50MB in size. For optimal performance, we recommend images under 25MB. If you need to process larger files, consider resizing them first or contact our support team.
faq.question4: Can I convert multiple images at once?
faq.answer4: Currently, our tool processes one image at a time to ensure the best quality and performance. However, you can quickly convert multiple images by repeating the simple 4-step process for each file.
faq.question5: Do you compress images during conversion?
faq.answer5: We offer quality control options for certain formats like JPG and WebP. By default, we maintain high quality (95%) while optimizing file size. You can adjust compression settings before conversion if needed.
faq.answer6: Yes! Our image converter is completely free to use with no hidden fees, subscriptions, or usage limits. We believe in providing accessible tools for everyone who works with images.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDescription: Our support team is here to help you with any questions about image conversion.

converterPage.step1Description: Select your {format} file by clicking the upload button or dragging and dropping it into the upload area. We'll automatically detect the format and prepare it for conversion.
converterPage.step2Description: The output format is automatically set to {format}, but you can change it if needed.
converterPage.step2DescWebP: {format} format offers excellent compression with high quality.
converterPage.step2DescPNG: {format} format offers lossless compression with transparency support.
converterPage.step2DescJPG: {format} format offers universal compatibility and smaller file sizes.
converterPage.step3Description: Click the convert button to transform your {from} image to {to}. The conversion happens instantly in your browser with no quality loss.
converterPage.step4Description: Your converted {format} image is ready! Download it directly to your device or use it immediately in your projects.
converterPage.whyConvertWebP: Converting {from} to {to} reduces file size by up to 30% while maintaining excellent quality, making it perfect for web use.
converterPage.whyConvertPNG: Converting {from} to {to} adds transparency support and lossless compression, ideal for graphics and logos.
converterPage.whyConvertJPG: Converting {from} to {to} provides universal compatibility and smaller file sizes for sharing and web use.
converterPage.qualityAffected: Will the image quality be affected?
converterPage.qualityAnswerWebP: Our {from} to {to} converter maintains the highest possible quality during conversion. WebP format provides excellent compression with minimal quality loss.
converterPage.qualityAnswerPNG: Our {from} to {to} converter maintains the highest possible quality during conversion. PNG is a lossless format, so there's no quality degradation.
converterPage.qualityAnswerJPG: Our {from} to {to} converter maintains the highest possible quality during conversion. JPG conversion uses high-quality compression settings by default.
converterPage.fileSizeAnswer: You can convert {format} files up to 50MB in size. For optimal performance and faster conversion, we recommend files under 25MB.

bgRemover.description: Remove backgrounds instantly with advanced AI technology. Perfect results in seconds.

bgRemover.pleaseSelectValidImage: Please select a valid image file
bgRemover.aiPoweredDesc: Advanced neural networks trained on millions of images for perfect edge detection
bgRemover.lightningFastDesc: Process images in seconds with optimized ML models running locally
bgRemover.privateDesc: All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device
bgRemover.professionalQualityDesc: Maintains image quality with transparent PNG output and perfect edges
bgRemover.watchHowAi: Watch how our AI instantly removes backgrounds with perfect edge detection
bgRemover.removeBackgroundsInSteps: Remove backgrounds from your images in just three simple steps
bgRemover.step1Desc: Simply drag and drop or select any image from your device. Supports all major formats.
bgRemover.step2Desc: Our advanced AI analyzes your image and intelligently removes the background in seconds.
bgRemover.step3Desc: Get a high-quality PNG with transparent background, ready to use anywhere.
bgRemover.fromEcommerceToCreative: From e-commerce to creative projects, our AI background remover has you covered
bgRemover.ecommerceDesc: Create professional product photos with clean, transparent backgrounds for your online store.
bgRemover.profilePicturesDesc: Remove distracting backgrounds from portraits and headshots for a professional look.
bgRemover.graphicDesignDesc: Isolate subjects for logos, posters, banners, and other creative projects.
bgRemover.photoEditingDesc: Extract subjects to combine with different backgrounds or create stunning compositions.
bgRemover.everythingYouNeed: Everything you need to know about our AI background remover
bgRemover.faqQuestion1: Is this background remover really free?
bgRemover.faqAnswer1: Yes! Our AI background remover is completely free to use with no hidden fees, watermarks, or sign-up required. Process as many images as you need.
bgRemover.faqQuestion2: Are my images stored on your servers?
bgRemover.faqAnswer2: No, all processing happens locally in your browser using AI technology. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.
bgRemover.faqAnswer3: We support all major image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, and more. The output is always a PNG file with transparent background.
bgRemover.faqQuestion4: How accurate is the AI background removal?
bgRemover.faqAnswer4: Our AI is trained on millions of images and uses advanced neural networks for accurate edge detection. It works best with clear subjects and good contrast.
bgRemover.faqQuestion5: What is the maximum file size?
bgRemover.faqAnswer5: Since processing happens in your browser, the limit depends on your device. Most modern devices can handle images up to 10-20MB without issues.
bgRemover.faqQuestion6: Can I use the results commercially?
bgRemover.faqAnswer6: Yes! You have full rights to use the processed images for any purpose, including commercial projects. The tool just processes your images without claiming any rights.
bgRemover.startUsingFreeAi: Start using our free AI background remover now. No sign-up required, completely private, and lightning fast.
